title: King Charles III delivers Christmas address, ending year of cancer scares
description: Charles offered his “heartfelt thanks” to medical staff who offered “strength, care and comfort” during cancer treatment
author: Karla Adam
excerpt: Charles offered his “heartfelt thanks” to medical staff who offered “strength, care and comfort” during cancer treatment
text: LONDON — King Charles III spoke about the “uncertainties and anxieties of illness” as he delivered his annual holiday message from a former hospital chapel, a poignant location given the king’s ongoing cancer treatment.British monarchs typically deliver their annual holiday speech from a palace or castle. But Charles broke with the long-standing tradition to deliver his address — infused with personal vulnerability — at Fitzrovia Chapel, now a community venue in central London.
html:
LONDON — King Charles III spoke about the “uncertainties and anxieties of illness” as he delivered his annual holiday message from a former hospital chapel, a poignant location given the king’s ongoing cancer treatment.

British monarchs typically deliver their annual holiday speech from a palace or castle. But Charles broke with the long-standing tradition to deliver his address — infused with personal vulnerability — at Fitzrovia Chapel, now a community venue in central London.
